/* gengetopt_strdup(): automatically generated from strdup.c. */
/* strdup.c replacement of strdup, which is not standard */
static char *
gengetopt_strdup (const char *s)
{
  char *result = (char*)malloc(strlen(s) + 1);
  if (result == (char*)0)
    return (char*)0;
  strcpy(result, s);
  return result;
}
